attributes.action: Abolish speeding fines and fit governers to all vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Speeding fines are simply another method for raising revenue for the Government. If we want to stop people speeding we wan introduce compulsory governing devices to all new vehicles and to all vehicles within 24 Months.
Statistics prove that people speed regardless of fines and penalties with many offenders not even holding a licence (joy riders etc)
My petition would provide a giant leap forward for road safety.
